channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A general Greenlees-May splitting principle
item.description: arXiv:2405.18885v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In equivariant topology, Greenlees and May used Mackey functors to show that, rationally, the stable homotopy category of $G$-spectra over a finite group $G$ splits as a product of simpler module categories. We extend the algebraic part (also independently proved by Th\'evenaz and Webb) of this classical result to Mackey modules over an arbitrary Green functor, and use the case of the complex representation ring Green functor to obtain an algebraic model of the rational equivariant Kasparov category of $G$-cell algebras.
item.dc:creator: Serge Bouc, Ivo Dell'Ambrogio, Rub\'en Martos
